participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and down-to-earth with a love for nature and animals.
participant_1.background: i work my parents farms. i drive a big truck and live in country. i have a pet cow. i am an electrician.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Active and sociable, enjoys outdoor activities and family time.
participant_2.background: i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor.
